desc: A service segment starting and uniquely identifying a message. The message type code for the Passenger list message is PAXLST.

attributes.name: MESSAGE REFERENCE NUMBER
attributes.desc: Unique message reference assigned by the sender.

attributes.name: Message type
attributes.desc: Code identifying a type of message and assigned by its controlling agency.

attributes.name: Message version number
attributes.desc: Version number of a message type.

attributes.name: Message release number
attributes.desc: Release number within the current message version number.

attributes.name: Controlling agency, coded
attributes.desc: Code identifying a controlling agency.

attributes.name: Association assigned code
attributes.desc: Code, assigned by the association responsible for the design and maintenance of the message type concerned, which further identifies the message.

attributes.name: COMMON ACCESS REFERENCE
attributes.desc: Reference serving as a key to relate all subsequent transfers of data to the same business case or file.

attributes.name: Sequence of transfers
attributes.desc: Number assigned by the sender indicating the transfer sequence of a message related to the same topic. The message could be an addition or a change to an earlier transfer related to the same topic.

desc: A segment to indicate the type and function of the message.

attributes.name: Document name code
attributes.desc: Code specifying the document name.

desc: A segment to specify message reference.

attributes.name: Reference code qualifier
attributes.desc: Code qualifying a reference.

attributes.name: Reference identifier
attributes.desc: Identifies a reference.

attributes.name: Document line identifier
attributes.desc: To identify a line of a document.

attributes.name: Reference version identifier
attributes.desc: To identify the version of a reference.

attributes.name: Revision identifier
attributes.desc: To identify a revision.

segments.desc:
A segment to identify the name, address and related function.
  A group of segments to specify name and/or address, person or department in the originating administration who can provide further information about the data in the message.

attributes.name: PARTY FUNCTION CODE QUALIFIER
attributes.desc: Code giving specific meaning to a party.

attributes.name: Party identifier
attributes.desc: Code specifying the identity of a party.

attributes.name: Name and address description
attributes.desc: Free form description of a name and address line.

attributes.name: Party name
attributes.desc: Name of a party.

segments.desc:
A segment to identify communication numbers of departments or persons to whom communication should be directed (e.g. telephone and/or fax number).
  A group of segments to specify name and/or address, person or department in the originating administration who can provide further information about the data in the message.

attributes.name: Communication address identifier
attributes.desc: To identify a communication address.

attributes.name: Communication address code qualifier
attributes.desc: Code qualifying the communication address.

segments.desc:
A segment to specify details of transport related to each leg, including means of transport, mode of transport name and/or number of vessel and/or vehicle and/or flight.
  A group of segments to indicate information related to each leg of the mode of transport.

attributes.name: TRANSPORT STAGE CODE QUALIFIER
attributes.desc: Code qualifying a specific stage of transport.

attributes.name: MEANS OF TRANSPORT JOURNEY IDENTIFIER
attributes.desc: To identify a journey of a means of transport.

attributes.name: Transport mode name code
attributes.desc: Code specifying the name of a mode of transport.

attributes.name: Transport means description code
attributes.desc: Code specifying the means of transport.

attributes.name: Carrier identifier
attributes.desc: To identify a carrier.

segments.desc:
A segment to specify locations such as place of departure, place of destination, country of ultimate destination, country and/or place of transit, country of transit termination, etc. of a passenger/crew.
  A group of segments indicating associated locations and dates.
  A group of segments to indicate information related to each leg of the mode of transport.

attributes.name: LOCATION FUNCTION CODE QUALIFIER
attributes.desc: Code identifying the function of a location.
attributes.value: Last place/port of call of conveyance

attributes.name: Location name code
attributes.desc: Code specifying the name of the location.

segments.desc:
A segment to specify associated dates and/or times as required related to locations.
  A group of segments indicating associated locations and dates.
  A group of segments to indicate information related to each leg of the mode of transport.

desc: A service segment ending a message, giving the total number of segments in the message (including the UNH & UNT) and the control reference number of the message.

attributes.name: NUMBER OF SEGMENTS IN A MESSAGE
attributes.desc: The number of segments in a message body, plus the message header segment and message trailer segment.
